Token.Abstract: Initialize setting of TS100, please call it after connected with remote TS100.

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: True value specifies the changes are temporary overwrites for settings. The changes are not saved into the EEPROM and take immediate effect (no rebooting required). False value specifies the changes are permanently overwrites for settings And also saved into the EEPROM. The changes will keep after rebooting the device.

Parameter.Name: isTemp

False value specifies the changes are permanently overwrites for settings And also saved into the EEPROM. The changes will keep after rebooting the device.

Parameter.Name: filterTypes
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the decoded type for reading tag data.

Parameter.Name: postDataDelimiter
Parameter.Abstract: Specifies the delimiter append to the end of output data.

Parameter.Name: outputInterface
Parameter.Abstract: The set of data output interface. also can 'outputInterface = OIHIDNVCOM | OIBLE;'

Token.Abstract: Get Device BLE module Gets the firmware program version running on the device BLE module.
Only for TS100 Gets the repeats mode of sounding the beep with the same pattern.

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: If the value is true, this setting will write into EEPROM.

Token.Abstract: Only for TS100 SetBuzzerOperationMode Sets the repeats mode of sounding the beep with the same pattern.

Parameter.Name: isTemp
Parameter.Abstract: If the value is true, this setting will write into EEPROM.

Parameter.Name: bom
Parameter.Abstract: Buzzer Operation Mode:Specifies the repeats mode of sounding the beep with the same pattern.

Token.Abstract: Only for TS100 Control reader to make a specified sound beep.
